laboratory_examinations.findings: NO BETA STREPTOCOCCUS GROUP A FOUND.

findings.liver: Normal in echotexture and architecture, no focal lesions.
findings.biliary: No intra or extra-hepatic biliary ductal dilatation, common duct measuring 3-mm.
findings.gallbladder: Nondistended and appears normal, without evidence of stones.
findings.kidneys: Right kidney measuring 13.7-cm, left kidney measuring 11.4-cm, both without mass, stone, or hydronephrosis.
findings.abdominal_aorta: Normal caliber, aortic wall measuring 2-3 mm thick.
